Package oop.project.cli

Class Argument<T>

java.lang.Object
oop.project.cli.Argument<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the argument.
public class Argument<T> extends Object
Represents an argument with configurable options.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class
    Description
    protected static class 
    Argument.Builder<T>
    A builder class to construct instances of the Argument class with flexible configuration options.

    • validate

      public T validate(String input) throws Exception
      Validates the input string and returns the parsed result.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string to validate and parse.
      Returns:
      The parsed result of type T.
      Throws:
      oop.project.cli.ValidationCustomConversionException - if custom type conversion fails.
      oop.project.cli.ValidationDefaultConversionException - if default type conversion fails.
      oop.project.cli.ValidationFunctionException - if the validation function returns false.
      NullPointerException - if the parsed input is null.
      Exception - if any other exception occurs during validation and parsing.

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage()
      Retrieves a message containing information about the argument.

      This method constructs a message containing details such as the argument name, type, whether it is required, and the help message associated with the argument (if available). The message is formatted for display.

      Returns:
      A formatted message containing information about the argument, including the help message.
